alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 8:24AM CDT until April 05 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR EASTERN CLARKE COUNTY... At 824 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crandall, or 12 miles southeast of Quitman, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Clarke County, including the following locations... Shubuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
